description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avatar Trials Ninja Redemption is a third person platforming game.  The sequel to the XBLIG top 250 best selling all time game Avatar Trials is back and better than ever! Parkour and free run through 5 epic levels, learn platforming skills, and become a ninja master!
description.short: Avatar Trials Ninja Redemption is a third person platforming game.  The sequel to the XBLIG top 250 best selling all time game Avatar Trials is back and better than ever! Parkour and free run through 5 epic levels, learn platforming skills, and become a ninja master!
